GPTA0_CLC

"GPTA Clock Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_CLC_ADDR = 0xF0001800
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000003
C typeGPTA0_CLC_t

GPTA0_CLC.bits "GPTA Clock Control Register"
Mask:GPTA0_CLC_MASK = 0x0000003f
Masks:  GPTA0_CLC_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTA0_CLC_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
DISR 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 32-bit SCU Module Disable Request Bit
DISS 1 1 - 1 r 0x00000002 32-bit SCU Module Disable Status Bit
SPEN 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 32-bit SCU Module Suspend Enable for OCDS
EDIS 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 External Request Disable
SBWE 1 4 - 4 w 0x00000010 32-bit SCU Module Suspend Bit Write Enable for OCDS
FSOE 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Fast Switch Off Enable
 readable0x0000002f 
writeable0x0000003d
volatile0x00000000


Top

 

GPTA0_DBGCTR

"GPTA Debug Clock Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_DBGCTR_ADDR = 0xF0001804
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTA0_DBGCTR_t

GPTA0_DBGCTR.bits "GPTA Debug Clock Control Register"
Mask:GPTA0_DBGCTR_MASK = 0x8000ffff
Masks:  GPTA0_DBGCTR_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTA0_DBGCTR_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
CLKCNT 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Debug Clock Count
DBGCEN 1 31 - 31 rw 0x80000000 Debug Clock Enable
0 The debug clock feature is disabled. The 32-bit SCU unit clocks are always enabled.
1 The debug clock feature is enabled. If a non-zero value is written to bit field CLKCNT the related number of clock pulses is issued at fGPTA0, fGPTA1, fLTCA2.
 readable0x8000ffff 
writeable0x8000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

GPTA0_ID

Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x0029C0XX

Mask:GPTAn_ID_MASK = 0xffffffff
Masks:  GPTAn_ID_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_ID_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD_REV 8 0 - 7 r 0x000000ff Module Revision Number
MOD_TYPE 8 8 - 15 r 0x0000ff00 Module Number Value
MOD_NUM 16 16 - 31 r 0xffff0000 Module Number Value
 readable0xffffffff 
writeable0x00000000
volatile0x00000000

GPTA0_FDR

"GPTA Fractional Divider Register"

AddressGPTA0_FDR_ADDR = 0xF000180C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTA0_FDR_t

GPTA0_FDR.bits "GPTA Fractional Divider Register"
Mask:GPTA0_FDR_MASK = 0xf3ffffff
Masks:  GPTA0_FDR_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTA0_FDR_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
STEP 10 0 - 9 rw 0x000003ff Step Value
FDIS 1 10 - 10 rw 0x00000400 Freeze Disable
0 Module operates on corrected clock, with reduced modulation jitter
1 Module operates on uncorrected clock with full modulation jitter
SM 1 11 - 11 rw 0x00000800 Suspend Mode
SC 2 12 - 13 rw 0x00003000 Suspend Control
DM 2 14 - 15 rw 0x0000c000 Divider Mode
RESULT 10 16 - 25 rh 0x03ff0000 Result Value
SUSACK 1 28 - 28 rh 0x10000000 Suspend Mode Acknowledge
SUSREQ 1 29 - 29 rh 0x20000000 Suspend Mode Request
ENHW 1 30 - 30 rw 0x40000000 Enable Hardware Clock Control
DISCLK 1 31 - 31 rwh 0x80000000 Disable Clock
 readable0xf3ffffff 
writeable0xc000ffff
volatile0xb3ff0000


Top

 

GPTA0_SRSC0

"GPTA0 Service Request State Clear Register 0"

AddressGPTA0_SRSC0_ADDR = 0xF0001810
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_SRSC0_t

GPTA0_SRSC0.bits "GPTA0 Service Request State Clear Register 0"
Mask:GPTAn_SRSC0_MASK = 0x00007fff
Masks:  GPTAn_SRSC0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_SRSC0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
DCM00R 1 0 - 0 rwh 0x00000001 DCMkk=0-3; k=0 refers to DCM00R, DCM00F, or DCM00C; k=1 refers to DCM01R, DCM01F, or DCM01C; k=2 refers to DCM02R, DCM02F, or DCM02C; k=3 refers to DCM03R, DCM03F, or DCM03C. Rising Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a rising edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM00F 1 1 - 1 rwh 0x00000002 DCMk Falling Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a falling edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM00C 1 2 - 2 rwh 0x00000004 DCMk Compare Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a compare event occurred in DCMk cell (k=0-3).
DCM01R 1 3 - 3 rwh 0x00000008 DCMkk=0-3; k=0 refers to DCM00R, DCM00F, or DCM00C; k=1 refers to DCM01R, DCM01F, or DCM01C; k=2 refers to DCM02R, DCM02F, or DCM02C; k=3 refers to DCM03R, DCM03F, or DCM03C. Rising Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a rising edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM01F 1 4 - 4 rwh 0x00000010 DCMk Falling Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a falling edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM01C 1 5 - 5 rwh 0x00000020 DCMk Compare Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a compare event occurred in DCMk cell (k=0-3).
DCM02R 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 DCMkk=0-3; k=0 refers to DCM00R, DCM00F, or DCM00C; k=1 refers to DCM01R, DCM01F, or DCM01C; k=2 refers to DCM02R, DCM02F, or DCM02C; k=3 refers to DCM03R, DCM03F, or DCM03C. Rising Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a rising edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM02F 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 DCMk Falling Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a falling edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM02C 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 DCMk Compare Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a compare event occurred in DCMk cell (k=0-3).
DCM03R 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 DCMkk=0-3; k=0 refers to DCM00R, DCM00F, or DCM00C; k=1 refers to DCM01R, DCM01F, or DCM01C; k=2 refers to DCM02R, DCM02F, or DCM02C; k=3 refers to DCM03R, DCM03F, or DCM03C. Rising Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a rising edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM03F 1 10 - 10 rwh 0x00000400 DCMk Falling Edge Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a falling edge detected on the DCMk input signal line.
DCM03C 1 11 - 11 rwh 0x00000800 DCMk Compare Event Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a compare event occurred in DCMk cell (k=0-3).
PLL 1 12 - 12 rwh 0x00001000 Counter Service Request State for PLL
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested because the counter for the number remaining output pulses decremented to 0.
GT00 1 13 - 13 rwh 0x00002000 GT0 Timer Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a GT0 timer overflow.
GT01 1 14 - 14 rwh 0x00004000 GT1 Timer Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a GT1 timer overflow.
 readable0x00007fff 
writeable0x00007fff
volatile0x00007fff


Top

0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a rising edge detected on DCMk input signal line.

0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a falling edge detected on DCMk input signal line.

1 Service is requested due to a compare event occurred in DCMk cell.

LTC29 1 29 - 29 rwh 0x20000000 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.
LTC30 1 30 - 30 rwh 0x40000000 LTCk Timer/Capture/Compare Service Request State
0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.

0 No service is requested.
1 Service is requested due to a timer overflow, capture, or compare event that occurred in LTCk.

GPTA0_MRACTL

"GPTA0 Multiplexer Register Array Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_MRACTL_ADDR = 0xF0001838
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_MRACTL_t

GPTA0_MRACTL.bits "GPTA0 Multiplexer Register Array Control Register"
Mask:GPTAn_MRACTL_MASK = 0x00003f07
Masks:  GPTAn_MRACTL_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_MRACTL_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MAEN 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 Multiplexer Array Enable
0 Multiplexer array is disabled; all cell inputs are driven with 0, 32-bit SCU I/O lines (pins) are disconnected and FIFO writing is enabled.
1 Multiplexer array is enabled; all cell and I/O line interconnections are established as previously programmed and FIFO writing is disabled.
WCRES 1 1 - 1 w 0x00000002 Write Count Reset
FIFOFULL 1 2 - 2 r 0x00000004 FIFO Full Status
0 FIFO not completely written (write access to MRADIN allowed).
1 FIFO completely written (write access to MRADIN ignored). Must be re-enabled via WCRES before array can be re-initialized.
FIFOFILLCNT 6 8 - 13 r 0x00003f00 FIFO Fill Count
 readable0x00003f05 
writeable0x00000003
volatile0x00000000

GPTA0_FPCCTR0

"GPTA0 Filter and Prescaler Cell Control Register 0"

AddressGPTA0_FPCCTR0_ADDR = 0xF0001848
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_FPCCTRm_t

GPTA0_FPCCTR0.bits "GPTA0 Filter and Prescaler Cell Control Register 0"
Mask:GPTAn_FPCCTRm_MASK = 0x01ffffff
Masks:  GPTAn_FPCCTRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_FPCCTRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
CMP 16 0 - 15 rw 0x0000ffff Threshold Value of Filter and Prescaler Cell k
MOD 3 16 - 18 rw 0x00070000 Operation Mode Selection for FPCk
000 Delayed Debounce Filter Mode on both edges
001 Immediate Debounce Filter Mode on both edges
010 Rising edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode, falling edge: no filtering
011 Rising edge: no filtering, falling edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode
100 Rising edge: Delayed Debounce Filter Mode, falling edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode
101 Rising edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode, falling edge: Delayed Debounce Filter Mode
110 Prescaler Mode (triggered on rising edge)
111 Prescaler Mode (triggered on falling edge)
IPS 3 19 - 21 rw 0x00380000 Input Line Selection for FPCk
000 Signal input SINk0 selected
001 Signal input SINk1 selected
010 Signal input SINk2 selected
011 Signal input SINk3 selected
100 Signal input SINk4=32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA selected
101 Signal input SINk5=preceding FPC output SOLk-1 selected; SIN05 is connected to SOL5
11X Reserved
CLK 2 22 - 23 rw 0x00c00000 Clock Selection for FPCk
00 CIock input line 0 selected (32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA)
01 Clock bus line 1 selected (local PLL clock)
10 Clock bus line 2 selected (prescaled) 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA or PLL clock from other unit or DCM 3 clock
11 Clock bus line 3 selected DCM 2 clock or PLL clock of other unit or uncompensated PLL clock or uncompensated PLL clock of other unit
RTG 1 24 - 24 rw 0x01000000 Reset Timer for FPCk on Glitch
0 Timer for FPCk is decremented on glitch
1 Timer for FPCk is cleared on glitch
 readable0x01ffffff 
writeable0x01ffffff
volatile0x00000000


Top

110 Prescaler Mode (triggered on rising edge)
111 Prescaler Mode (triggered on falling edge)
IPS 3 19 - 21 rw 0x00380000 Input Line Selection for FPCk
000 Signal input SINk0 selected
001 Signal input SINk1 selected
010 Signal input SINk2 selected
011 Signal input SINk3 selected
100 Signal input SINk4=32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA selected
101 Signal input SINk5=preceding FPC output SOLk-1 selected; SIN05 is connected to SOL5
11X Reserved
CLK 2 22 - 23 rw 0x00c00000 Clock Selection for FPCk
00 CIock input line 0 selected (32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA)
01 Clock bus line 1 selected (local PLL clock)
10 Clock bus line 2 selected (prescaled) 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA or PLL clock from other unit or DCM 3 clock
11 Clock bus line 3 selected DCM 2 clock or PLL clock of other unit or uncompensated PLL clock or uncompensated PLL clock of other unit
RTG 1 24 - 24 rw 0x01000000 Reset Timer for FPCk on Glitch
0 Timer for FPCk is decremented on glitch
1 Timer for FPCk is cleared on glitch
 readable0x01ffffff 
writeable0x01ffffff
volatile0x00000000


Top

000 Delayed Debounce Filter Mode on both edges
001 Immediate Debounce Filter Mode on both edges
010 Rising edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode, falling edge: no filtering
011 Rising edge: no filtering, falling edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode
100 Rising edge: Delayed Debounce Filter Mode, falling edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode
101 Rising edge: Immediate Debounce Filter Mode, falling edge: Delayed Debounce Filter Mode
110 Prescaler Mode (triggered on rising edge)
111 Prescaler Mode (triggered on falling edge)

GPTA0_PDLCTR

"GPTA0 Phase Discrimination Logic Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_PDLCTR_ADDR = 0xF0001878
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_PDLCTR_t

GPTA0_PDLCTR.bits "GPTA0 Phase Discrimination Logic Control Register"
Mask:GPTAn_PDLCTR_MASK = 0x00000077
Masks:  GPTAn_PDLCTR_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_PDLCTR_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MUX0 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 Output Signal Source Selection for PDL0
0 DCM0 cell input is driven by fed-through FPC0 output lines
1 DCM0 cell input is provided with PDL0 "Forward" and "Backward" pulses
TSE0 1 1 - 1 rw 0x00000002 3-Sensor Mode Enable for PDL0
0 PDL0 operates in "2-Sensor Mode" and DCM1 cell input is driven by fed-through FPC2 output lines
1 PDL0 operates in "3-Sensor Mode" and DCM1 cell input is provided with PDL0 error information
ERR0 1 2 - 2 rwh 0x00000004 Error Flag for PDL0
0 No error has occurred
1 Error detected in "3-Sensor Mode": all PDL0 input signals are simultaneously provided with high or low level
MUX1 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Output Signal Source Selection for PDL1
0 DCM2 cell input is driven by fed-through FPC3 output lines
1 DCM2 cell input is provided with PDL1 "Forward" and "Backward" pulses
TSE1 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 3-Sensor Mode Enable for PDL1
0 PDL1 operates in "2-Sensor Mode" and DCM3 cell input is driven by fed-through FPC5 output lines
1 PDL1 operates in "3-Sensor Mode" and DCM3 cell input is provided with PDL1 error information
ERR1 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Error Flag for PDL1
0 No error has occurred
1 Error detected in "3-Sensor Mode": all PDL1 input signals are simultaneously provided with high or low level
 readable0x00000077 
writeable0x00000077
volatile0x00000044


Top

 

GPTA0_DCMCTR0

"GPTA0 Duty Cycle Measurement Control Register 0"

AddressGPTA0_DCMCTR0_ADDR = 0xF0001880
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_DCMCTRm_t

GPTA0_DCMCTR0.bits "GPTA0 Duty Cycle Measurement Control Register 0"
Mask:GPTAn_DCMCTRm_MASK = 0x000003ff
Masks:  GPTAn_DCMCTRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_DCMCTRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
RCA 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 Trigger Source Selection for Capture Event
0 Timer contents are copied to DCMCAVk capture register on a falling input signal edge
1 Timer contents are copied to capture register on a rising input signal edge
OCA 1 1 - 1 rw 0x00000002 Trigger Source for Capture/Compare Register Update
0 Capture/Compare register DCMCOVk is not affected.
1 Timer contents are copied to DCMCOVk capture/compare register on the opposite edge selected by RCAk.
RZE 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 Timer Reset on Rising Edge
0 Timer is not affected
1 Timer is reset on a rising input signal edge
FZE 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Timer Reset on Falling Edge
0 Timer is not affected
1 Timer is reset on a falling input signal edge
RCK 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Output Pulse on Rising Edge
0 DCM output line is not affected
1 DCM output line is provided with a single clock pulse generated on a rising input signal edge
FCK 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Output Pulse on Falling Edge
0 DCM output line is not affected
1 DCM output line is provided with a single clock pulse generated on a falling input signal edge
QCK 1 6 - 6 w 0x00000040 Additional Output Pulse Generation
0 DCM output line is not affected
1 DCM output line is immediately provided with a single clock pulse
RRE 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Interrupt Request on Rising Edge
0 Interrupt request is not affected
1 Interrupt request is set on rising input signal edge
FRE 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Interrupt Request on Falling Edge
0 Interrupt request is not affected
1 Interrupt request is set on falling input signal edge
CRE 1 9 - 9 rw 0x00000200 Interrupt Request on Compare Event
0 Interrupt request is not affected
1 Interrupt request is set when the timer matches capture/compare register DCMCOVk
 readable0x000003bf 
writeable0x000003ff
volatile0x00000000


Top

AddressGPTA0_DCMCAV3_ADDR = 0xF00018B8
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_DCMCAVm_t

GPTA0_DCMCAV3.bits "GPTA0 Duty Cycle Measurement Capture Register 3"
Mask:GPTAn_DCMCAVm_MASK = 0x00ffffff
Masks:  GPTAn_DCMCAVm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_DCMCAVm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
CAV 24 0 - 23 rwh 0x00ffffff Capture Value of DCMk
 readable0x00ffffff 
writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff

GPTA0_PLLCTR

"GPTA0 Phase Locked Loop Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_PLLCTR_ADDR = 0xF00018C0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_PLLCTR_t

GPTA0_PLLCTR.bits "GPTA0 Phase Locked Loop Control Register"
Mask:GPTAn_PLLCTR_MASK = 0x0000001f
Masks:  GPTAn_PLLCTR_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_PLLCTR_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MUX 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Trigger Input Channel Selection
00 DCM0 output is selected as PLL input
01 DCM1 output is selected as PLL input
10 DCM2 output is selected as PLL input
11 DCM3 output is selected as PLL input
AEN 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 Automatic End Mode Enable
0 Automatic End Mode is disabled
1 Automatic End Mode is enabled
PEN 1 3 - 3 rwh 0x00000008 Unexpected Period End Behavior
0 Counter decrements with constant frequency
1 Counter is allowed to decrement with fGPTA frequency in case of an input signal period length' reduction
REN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Interrupt Service Request Enable
0 Interrupt request is disabled
1 An interrupt request is set when the number of remaining output pulses to be generated reaches zero
 readable0x0000001f 
writeable0x0000001f
volatile0x00000008


Top

Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MTI 16 0 - 15 rw 0x0000ffff Microtick Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x00000000

GPTA0_CKBCTR

"GPTA0 Clock Bus Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_CKBCTR_ADDR = 0xF00018D8
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x0000FFFF
C typeGPTAn_CKBCTR_t

GPTA0_CKBCTR.bits "GPTA0 Clock Bus Control Register"
Mask:GPTAn_CKBCTR_MASK = 0x001fffff
Masks:  GPTAn_CKBCTR_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_CKBCTR_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
DFA02 4 0 - 3 rw 0x0000000f Clock Line 2 Driving Source Selection
0 CLK2 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA02
1 CLK2 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA02
13 CLK2 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA02
14 CLK2 is driven by PLL clock of other 32-bit SCU unit
15 CLK2 is driven by DCM3 output
DFA04 4 4 - 7 rw 0x000000f0 Clock Line 4 Driving Source Selection
0 CLK4 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA04
1 CLK4 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA04
14 CLK4 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA04
15 CLK4 is driven by DCM1 output
DFA06 4 8 - 11 rw 0x00000f00 Clock Line 6 Driving Source Selection
0 CLK6 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA06
1 CLK6 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA06
14 CLK6 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA06
15 CLK6 is driven by FPC1 output
DFA07 4 12 - 15 rw 0x0000f000 Clock Line 7 Driving Source Selection
0 CLK7 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA07
1 CLK7 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA07
14 CLK7 is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFA07
15 CLK7 is driven by FPC4 output
DFA03 2 16 - 17 rw 0x00030000 Clock Line 3 Driving Source Selection
0 CLK3 is driven by DCM2 output
1 CLK3 is driven by PLL clock of other 32-bit SCU unit
2 CLK3 is driven by uncompensated PLL clock
3 CLK3 is driven by uncompensated PLL clock of other 32-bit SCU unit
DFALTC 3 18 - 20 rw 0x001c0000 Dividing Factor for LTC Prescaler Clock Selection
0 The LTCPRE clock is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFALTC.
1 The LTCPRE clock is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFALTC.
7 The LTCPRE clock is provided with the 32-bit SCU module clock fGPTA divided by 2DFALTC.
 readable0x001fffff 
writeable0x001fffff
volatile0x00000000


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCTR0

"GPTA0 Global Timer Control Register 0"

AddressGPTA0_GTCTR0_ADDR = 0xF00018E0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCTR0.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Control Register 0"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCTRm_MASK = 0x000000ff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCTRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCTRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
SCO 4 0 - 3 rw 0x0000000f TGE Flag Source Selection
0000 10th bit is used as TGE flag.
0001 11
0010 21
0011 31
0100 41
0101 51
0110 61
0111 71
1000 81
1001 91
1010 101
1011 111
1100 121
1101 131
1110 24th bit is used as TGE flag.
1111 25th bit is used as TGE flag.
MUX 3 4 - 6 rw 0x00000070 Timer Clock Selection
000 Clock bus line CLK0 selected
001 Clock bus line CLK1 selected
010 Clock bus line CLK2 selected
011 Clock bus line CLK3 selected
100 Clock bus line CLK4 selected
101 Clock bus line CLK5 selected
110 Clock bus line CLK6 selected
111 Clock bus line CLK7 selected
REN 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Interrupt Request Enable
0 The interrupt request is disabled
1 An interrupt request is generated when timer GTk overflows
 readable0x000000ff 
writeable0x000000ff
volatile0x00000000


Top

GPTA0_GTCCTR00

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 00"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR00_ADDR = 0xF0001900
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR00.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR00.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

GPTA0_GTCCTR01

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 01"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR01_ADDR = 0xF0001908
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR01.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR01.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCXR01

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 01"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR01_ADDR = 0xF000190C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

GPTA0_GTCXR01.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 01"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCXRm_MASK = 0x00ffffff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 24 0 - 23 rwh 0x00ffffff Capture/Compare Register Contents of GTCk
 readable0x00ffffff 
writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCCTR02

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 02"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR02_ADDR = 0xF0001910
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR02.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 02 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR02.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 02 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCXR05

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 05"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR05_ADDR = 0xF000192C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

GPTA0_GTCXR05.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 05"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCXRm_MASK = 0x00ffffff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 24 0 - 23 rwh 0x00ffffff Capture/Compare Register Contents of GTCk
 readable0x00ffffff 
writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCCTR06

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 06"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR06_ADDR = 0xF0001930
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR06.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR06.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCXR09

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 09"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR09_ADDR = 0xF000194C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

Mask:GPTAn_GTCXRm_MASK = 0x00ffffff

writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff

GPTA0_GTCCTR10

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 10"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR10_ADDR = 0xF0001950
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR10.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 10 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR10.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 10 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 13"

Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000

GPTA0_GTCCTR14

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 14"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR14_ADDR = 0xF0001970
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR14.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 14 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR14.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 14 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.

GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCXR17

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 17"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR17_ADDR = 0xF000198C
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

GPTA0_GTCXR17.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 17"

writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff

GPTA0_GTCCTR18

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 18"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR18_ADDR = 0xF0001990
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR18.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 18 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR18.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 18 [Compare Mode]"

Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK

REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCXR21

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 21"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR21_ADDR = 0xF00019AC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

GPTA0_GTCXR21.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 21"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCXRm_MASK = 0x00ffffff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description

 readable0x00ffffff 
writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCCTR22

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 22"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR22_ADDR = 0xF00019B0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR22.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 22 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR22.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 22 [Compare Mode]"

Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT

11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 25"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR25_ADDR = 0xF00019CC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

GPTA0_GTCXR25.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 25"

Masks:  GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description

 readable0x00ffffff 
writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff

GPTA0_GTCCTR26

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 26"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR26_ADDR = 0xF00019D0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR26.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 26 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_GTCCTR26.comp "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 26 [Compare Mode]"

MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
GES 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Greater Equal Select
0 An "equal" compare is selected.
1 A "greater equal" compare is required.
CAC 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Capture after Compare Select
0 Capture after compare is disabled.
1 After a compare event, the contents of the associated Global Timer as selected by MOD or (depending on control bit CAT) the contents of the alternate Global Timer are copied to the capture/compare register GTCXRk.
CAT 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Capture Alternate Timer
0 The Global Timer as selected by MOD is captured, if enabled by control bit CAC=1.
1 The alternate Global Timer is captured.
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500


Top

 

GPTA0_GTCXR29

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 29"

AddressGPTA0_GTCXR29_ADDR = 0xF00019EC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCXRm_t

GPTA0_GTCXR29.bits "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell X Register 29"

Masks:  GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description

 readable0x00ffffff 
writeable0x00ffffff
volatile0x00ffffff
