GPTA0_GTCCTR30

"GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 30"

AddressGPTA0_GTCCTR30_ADDR = 0xF00019F0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_GTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_GTCCTR30.capt "GPTA0 Global Timer Cell Control Register 30 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0000fdff
Masks:  GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_GTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT0.
01 GTCk operates in Capture Mode hooked to GT1.
10 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT0.
11 GTCk operates in Compare Mode hooked to GT1.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 GTCk is continuously enabled.
1 GTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Interrupt Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request line SQSk is activated when a capture or compare event has occurred.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the GTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the GTCkIN input line.
NE 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Not Effective
BYP 1 7 - 7 rw 0x00000080 Bypass
0 M0O/M1O lines are affected either by M0I/M1I lines or by OCM0/OCM1 bits.
1 M0O/M1O lines are affected only by M0I/M1I lines.
EOA 1 8 - 8 rwh 0x00000100 Enable On Action
0 GTCk is enabled for local events.
1 GTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 GTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 GTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of GTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 GTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX GTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal GTCk event only.
1XX GTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal GTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent GTCn (n = less or equal k) and reported by the M1I, M0I interface lines.
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 GTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 GTCkOUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000fdff 
writeable0x000079ff
volatile0x00008500

GPTA0_LTCCTR00

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 00"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR00_ADDR = 0xF0001A00
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR00.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR00.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR00.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR00.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 00 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

Reset value0x00000000

writeable0x0000ffff

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR01

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 01"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR01_ADDR = 0xF0001A08
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR01.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR01.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 01 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR02.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 02 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR03

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 03"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR03_ADDR = 0xF0001A18
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR03.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 03 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR03.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 03 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR04.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 04 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR04.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 04 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

GPTA0_LTCXR04

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell X Register 04"

AddressGPTA0_LTCXR04_ADDR = 0xF0001A24
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCXRm_t

GPTA0_LTCXR04.bits "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell X Register 04"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCXRm_MASK = 0x0000ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value
 readable0x0000ffff 
writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR05

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 05"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR05_ADDR = 0xF0001A28
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR05.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 05 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR05.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 05 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.

0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.

1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.

GPTA0_LTCCTR06.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action

0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR06.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR06.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 06 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR07

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 07"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR07_ADDR = 0xF0001A38
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR07.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 07 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR07.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 07 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR08.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 08 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR08.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 08 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR08.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 08 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR09

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 09"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR09_ADDR = 0xF0001A48
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR09.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 09 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR09.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 09 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.

1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.

0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR10.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 10 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR10.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 10 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable

1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.

0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.

0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
