Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR52

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 52"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR52_ADDR = 0xF0001BA0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR52.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 52 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR52.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 52 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR52.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 52 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR52.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 52 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description

10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

GPTA0_LTCCTR53.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 53 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.

X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

GPTA0_LTCXR53

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell X Register 53"

AddressGPTA0_LTCXR53_ADDR = 0xF0001BAC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR54

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 54"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR54_ADDR = 0xF0001BB0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR54.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 54 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR54.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 54 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR54.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 54 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR54.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 54 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"

Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT

00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable

1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).

1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.

0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.

0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).

0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.

0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.

0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

 

GPTA0_LTCXR55

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell X Register 55"

AddressGPTA0_LTCXR55_ADDR = 0xF0001BBC
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000

Masks:  GPTAn_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCXRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
X 16 0 - 15 rwh 0x0000ffff Local Timer Data Register Value

writeable0x0000ffff
volatile0x0000ffff


Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR56

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 56"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR56_ADDR = 0xF0001BC0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR56.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 56 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR56.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 56 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR57.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 57 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640


Top

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR58

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 58"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR58_ADDR = 0xF0001BD0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR58.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 58 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR58.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 58 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

GPTA0_LTCCTR59.timer_ilm1 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 59 [Timer Mode ILM=1]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
PEN 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 LTC Prescaler Enable
0 LTC Prescaler Mode is disabled.
1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.
AIL 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Active Input Level Select
0 Input signal is active high.
1 Input signal is active low.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

Top

 

GPTA0_LTCCTR60

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 60"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR60_ADDR = 0xF0001BE0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR60.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 60 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR60.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 60 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR61.timer_ilm0 "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 61 [Timer Mode ILM=0]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM0_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a rising edge.
1 Timer is updated by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Timer is not updated by a falling edge.
1 Timer is updated by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
SLO 1 6 - 6 rwh 0x00000040 Select Line Output
0 State of select line output SO is 0.
1 State of select line output SO is 1.
CUDCLR 1 7 - 7 w 0x00000080 Coherent Update Disable
0 No effect.
1 Coherent update disabled (bit CUD is cleared).
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CUD 1 9 - 9 rwh 0x00000200 Coherent Update Enable
0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ff7f 
writeable0x00017bff
volatile0x00008640

Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_TIMER_ILM1_<Bit field>_SHIFT

MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.

1 LTC Prescaler Mode with LTC prescaler clock LTCPRE is enabled.

0 Select output SO is not toggled on timer reset overflow.
1 Select output SO is toggled on next timer reset overflow.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).

0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.

1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.

GPTA0_LTCCTR62

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 62"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR62_ADDR = 0xF0001BF0
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTRm_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR62.capt "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 62 [Capture Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_CAPT_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Input Rising Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a rising edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a rising edge on the LTCkIN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Input Falling Edge Select
0 Capture event is not triggered by a falling edge.
1 Capture event is triggered by a falling edge on the LTCkIN input line.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Local Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I (GBYP=0) or M2I/M2I (GBYP=1) lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Capture & Compare Mode: Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR62.comp "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 62 [Compare Mode]"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_MASK = 0x0001ffff
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTRm_COMP_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MOD 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Mode Control Bits
00 LTCk operates in Capture Mode.
01 LTCk operates in Compare Mode.
10 LTCk operates in Free-Running Timer Mode.
11 LTCk operates in reset Timer Mode.
OSM 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 One Shot Mode Enable
0 LTCk is continuously enabled.
1 LTCk is enabled for one event only.
REN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 Request Enable
0 Service request is disabled.
1 Service request SQSk is activated when a - capture event has occurred - compare event has occurred - timer overflow has happened depending on the operation mode selected by bit field MOD.
SOL 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Compare Mode: Select Output Low
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a low level on select input SITo enable Compare Mode in all cases, SOL and SOH bits must be set to 1..
SOH 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Compare Mode: Select Output High
0 Compare is deactivated or on high level.
1 Compare operation is enabled by a high level on select input SI.
BYP 1 6 - 6 rw 0x00000040 Bypass
0 M1O/M0O lines are affected either by M1I/M0I lines or by OCM1/OCM0 bits.
1 M1O/M0O lines are affected only by M1I/M0I lines.
EOA 1 7 - 7 rwh 0x00000080 Enable On Action
0 LTCk is enabled for local events.
1 LTCk is disabled for local events. On an event on the communication link via M0I/M1I lines, EOA will be cleared and local events will be enabled.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Input Line Mode
0 Input line is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 Input line is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
SLL 1 9 - 9 rh 0x00000200 Select Line Level
0 Current state of select input SI is 0.
1 Current state of select input SI is 1.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Cell Enable
0 LTCk is currently disabled for local events.
1 LTCk is currently enabled for local events.
OCM 3 11 - 13 rw 0x00003800 Output Control Mode Select
X00 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is hold.
X01 Current state of LTCkOUT output line is toggled.
X10 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 0.
X11 LTCkOUT output line is forced to 1.
0XX LTCkOUT output line state is set by an internal LTCk event only.
1XX LTCkOUT output line state is affected by an internal LTCk event and/or by an operation occurred in an adjacent LTCk cell (reported by M1I/M0I interface lines).
OIA 1 14 - 14 rw 0x00004000 Output Immediate Action
0 No immediate action required.
1 Action defined by bit field OCM must be performed immediately.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTCkOUT output line is 0.
1 LTCkOUT output line is 1.
GBYP 1 16 - 16 rw 0x00010000 Global Bypass
0 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M1I/M0I lines.
1 M3O/M2O lines are affected by M3I/M2I lines.
 readable0x0001ffff 
writeable0x000179ff
volatile0x00008680

GPTA0_LTCCTR63

"GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 63"

AddressGPTA0_LTCCTR63_ADDR = 0xF0001BF8
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_LTCCTR63_t

GPTA0_LTCCTR63.bits "GPTA0 Local Timer Cell Control Register 63"
Mask:GPTAn_LTCCTR63_MASK = 0x0000853f
Masks:  GPTAn_LTCCTR63_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_LTCCTR63_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
BRM 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 Bit Reversal Mode Control
0 Compare uses normal sequence of local input data bus (YI) bits.
1 Compare uses reversed sequence of local input data bus (YI) bits.
OSM 1 1 - 1 rw 0x00000002 One Shot Mode Enable for Shadow Register Copy
0 Shadow register copy is continuously enabled.
1 Shadow register copy is enabled for one event only.
REN 2 2 - 3 rw 0x0000000c Request Enable
00 Service request SQT63 is disabled.
01 Service request SQT63 is generated when a compare event has occurred.
10 Service request SQT63 is generated when a shadow register copy event has occurred.
11 Reserved.
RED 1 4 - 4 rw 0x00000010 Rising Edge Select for Shadow Register Copy
0 Shadow register copy is not triggered by a rising edge on the LTC63IN input line.
1 Shadow register copy is triggered by a rising edge on the LTC63IN input line.
FED 1 5 - 5 rw 0x00000020 Falling Edge Select for Shadow Register Copy
0 Shadow register copy is not triggered by a falling edge on the LTC63IN input line.
1 Shadow register copy is triggered by a falling edge on the LTC63IN input line.
ILM 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 Shadow Register Copy Input Line Mode
0 LTC63IN is operating in Edge Sensitive Mode.
1 LTC63IN is operating in Level Sensitive Mode.
CEN 1 10 - 10 rh 0x00000400 Enable for Shadow Register Copy
0 Shadow register copy is currently disabled.
1 Shadow register copy is currently enabled.
OUT 1 15 - 15 rh 0x00008000 Output State
0 LTC63OUT output line is 0.
1 LTC63OUT output line is 1.
 readable0x0000853f 
writeable0x0000013f
volatile0x00008400


Top

GPTA0_EDCTR

"GPTA Clock Enable/Disable Control Register"

AddressGPTA0_EDCTR_ADDR = 0xF0001C00
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTA0_EDCTR_t

GPTA0_EDCTR.bits "GPTA Clock Enable/Disable Control Register"
Mask:GPTA0_EDCTR_MASK = 0x0000070f
Masks:  GPTA0_EDCTR_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTA0_EDCTR_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
GT00RUN 1 0 - 0 rw 0x00000001 GPTA0 Global Timer 0 Run Control
0 GPTA0 Global Timer 0 clock is stopped.
1 GPTA0 Global Timer 0 clock is started/running.
GT01RUN 1 1 - 1 rw 0x00000002 GPTA0 Global Timer 1 Run Control
0 GPTA0 Global Timer 1 clock is stopped.
1 GPTA0 Global Timer 1 clock is started/running.
GT10RUN 1 2 - 2 rw 0x00000004 GPTA1 Global Timer 0 Run Control
0 GPTA1 Global Timer 0 clock is stopped.
1 GPTA1 Global Timer 0 clock is started/running.
GT11RUN 1 3 - 3 rw 0x00000008 GPTA1 Global Timer 1 Run Control
0 GPTA1 Global Timer 1 clock is stopped.
1 GPTA1 Global Timer 1 clock is started/running.
G0EN 1 8 - 8 rw 0x00000100 GPTA0 Timer Clock Enable
0 GPTA0 timer clock fGPTA0 is disabled.
1 GPTA0 timer clock fGPTA0 is enabled.
G1EN 1 9 - 9 rw 0x00000200 GPTA1 Timer Clock Enable
0 GPTA1 timer clock fGPTA1 is disabled.
1 GPTA1 timer clock fGPTA1 is enabled.
L2EN 1 10 - 10 rw 0x00000400 LTCA2 Timer Clock Enable
0 LTCA2 timer clock fLTCA2 is disabled.
1 LTCA2 timer clock fLTCA2 is enabled.
 readable0x0000070f 
writeable0x0000070f
volatile0x00000000


Top

 

GPTA0_MMXCTR00

"GPTA-to-MSC Multiplexer Control Register 00"

AddressGPTA0_MMXCTR00_ADDR = 0xF0001F00
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTA0_MMXCTRm_t

GPTA0_MMXCTR00.bits "GPTA-to-MSC Multiplexer Control Register 00"
Mask:GPTA0_MMXCTRm_MASK = 0xffffffff
Masks:  GPTA0_MMXCTRm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTA0_MMXCTRm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
MUX0 2 0 - 1 rw 0x00000003 Multiplexer Control for MSC0 Inputs ALTINH.(n+8)
00 GPTA0 output OUT[80+n] selected and connected to MSC0 ALTINH.(n+8)

GPTA0_SRC37

"GPTA0 Interrupt Service Request Control Register 37"

AddressGPTA0_SRC37_ADDR = 0xF0001F68
Absolute addressableYes
Reset value0x00000000
C typeGPTAn_SRCm_t

GPTA0_SRC37.bits "GPTA0 Interrupt Service Request Control Register 37"
Mask:GPTAn_SRCm_MASK = 0x0000f4ff
Masks:  GPTAn_SRCm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_SRCm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
SRPN 8 0 - 7 rw 0x000000ff Service Request Priority Number
TOS 1 10 - 10 rw 0x00000400 Type of Service Control
SRE 1 12 - 12 rw 0x00001000 Service Request Enable
SRR 1 13 - 13 rh 0x00002000 Service Request Flag
CLRR 1 14 - 14 w 0x00004000 Request Clear Bit
SETR 1 15 - 15 w 0x00008000 Request Set Bit
 readable0x000034ff 
writeable0x0000d4ff
volatile0x00002000


Top

TOS 1 10 - 10 rw 0x00000400 Type of Service Control

SRR 1 13 - 13 rh 0x00002000 Service Request Flag

GPTA0_SRC07.bits "GPTA0 Interrupt Service Request Control Register 07"
Mask:GPTAn_SRCm_MASK = 0x0000f4ff
Masks:  GPTAn_SRCm_<Bit field>_MASK
LSBs:GPTAn_SRCm_<Bit field>_SHIFT
Bit field #Bits Bits' position Access Mask Description
SRPN 8 0 - 7 rw 0x000000ff Service Request Priority Number
TOS 1 10 - 10 rw 0x00000400 Type of Service Control
SRE 1 12 - 12 rw 0x00001000 Service Request Enable
SRR 1 13 - 13 rh 0x00002000 Service Request Flag
CLRR 1 14 - 14 w 0x00004000 Request Clear Bit
SETR 1 15 - 15 w 0x00008000 Request Set Bit
